title: (Indie Rock) Brandtson - Death and Taxes (plus bonus songs) (200
description:
Brandtson is an indie rock/emo band that formed in 1996 in Cleveland, Ohio. It was originally a side project for Myk Porter, the vocalist of the Christian hardcore band, Six Feet Deep. Porter got his friend Jared Jolley to play drums in the band. Soon thereafter, Six Feet Deep broke up and Brandtson became a full-time band with the addition of Matt Traxler (also of Six Feet Deep) on guitar and John Sayre on bass.

Death & Taxes is an EP by Brandtson released on April 22, 2003
